GetTableData Request¶

GET /Table¶

This post request returns database connection data (except password)

Example request:

GET /Table HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
Accept: application/json
Request Headers

  • user_token – User token.

Query Parameters

  • local_table_name – Local name of a table.

Example response:

  HTTP/1.1 200 OK
  Vary: Accept
  Content-Type: application/json

{
    "TableData": {
        "columns": {
            "column1": "timestamp without time zone",
            "column2": "text",
            "column3": "real",
        },
        "database_name": "local-database-name",
        "folder_name": "folder-name-in-database",
        "table_name": "table-name-in-database"
    },
    "status": "success"
}
Status Codes

  • 200 OK – No errors.

  • 403 Forbidden – Access denied. Check token in a header.

  • 400 Bad Request – Bad request. Check request body or headers.

  • 404 Not Found – Table not found
